API_Description: Determines if a document at the specified path is read-only.
API_Description_Reason: The method name 'isDocReadOnly' suggests it checks the read-only status of a document. The parameter 'cDocPath' indicates it operates on a document specified by a path.
Returns: A boolean indicating whether the document is read-only.
Returns_Reason: The method name implies a true/false return value, typical for 'is' prefixed methods that check a condition.

cDocPath.description: The file path of the document to check.
cDocPath.description_reason: The parameter name 'cDocPath' suggests it is a string representing the path to the document.
cDocPath.type_reason: File paths are typically represented as strings in programming.
